overview: The film, made by award-winning Liverpool film-makers Phil Maxwell and Hazuan Hashim, interviews left activists hit by the smear campaign and the purge the smears were used to justify â€“ and the towering hypocrisy on the part of the Labour leadership that lies behind it.
tagline: The Art of Resistance and Merseyside Pensioners' TV's analysis of Keir Starmer's smear-driven war on the left.
title: The Anatomy of a Witch-hunt
